name: Sunday Lake
description:
(Made for At0m game jam)

Sunday Lake is a chill fishing game where you play as a middle-aged man.  It's just another ordinary sunday activity.

Theme:

I'm a middle-aged fisherman and i record all the fish species i explore ,  to my fish journal. This Sunday , hopefully i will find all the missing species.

Purpose:

Explore all the unknown fish species and mysterious collection items and fill your Journal with them.

Controls:

- WASD:  Move

- Left Mouse:  Use Fishing Rod , Select

- "E":  Interact

- "f11":  Fullscreen toggle

How to fish?:

-Hold left mouse button to charge the fishing rod.

-Release to throw.

-Tap repeatedly to pull the fish.

Asset Kullanımı:

-Grafikler , kodlar ve müziklerin tamamı jam için sıfırdan 3 gün içinde yapıldı.

-Ses efektleri ve okyanus sesi hazır asset.

Developers (twitter):

  • Cagatay Demir
  • Muhammed Emin Altun

Made for 'At0m Game Jam' in 72 hours by Çağatay Demir and Muhammed Emin Altun.
